description: We welcome you to listen to our e-sports commentary of the 2022 Trackmania World Cup Finals. A research into the ways humans and AI can collaborate, through the medium of sports narration. Real-time events are used as input to generate AI scripts, which are in turn fed into a tekst-to-speech network. By doing so, we hope to close a gap between the way humans and artificial intelligencesÂ interface.
